qas.question: What happened to the king after the trial?
Who else was involved in the warfare?
name an event that can be contributed to the revolution.

context: The changes were accompanied by violent turmoil which included the trial and <a0_0>execution of the king<a0_0/>, vast bloodshed and repression during the Reign of Terror, and warfare involving <a1_0>every other major European power.<a1_0/> Subsequent events that can be traced to the Revolution include <a2_0>the Napoleonic Wars<a2_0/>, two separate restorations of the monarchy, and two additional revolutions as modern France took shape. In the following century, France would be governed at one point or another as a republic, constitutional monarchy, and two different empires.
